title: Logging in to my Commonwealth Bank Account

title: Open a new tab always switch to the new tab!!
content: Tough there is an option in Settings that says "When you open a link, image or media in a new tab, switch to it immediately" that can be deactivated, my browser always switch to the new tab/open link/image/etc. It's frustrating. Using Mozilla for Linux Mint mint-001 - 1.0. Version 137.0 (64 bit)

creator: namath

title: Endless crashes
content:
I have Firefox on two separate computers, a desktop running Win7Prof64bit and a laptop running Win10Pro 64bit. Both Firefox installations crash constantly, ie every 10 - 15 mins. They show the "Gah! Firefox just crashed. Please tell us what you were doing", and the box to return the data to Mozilla. With Restore This Tab at the bottom.

I always send you these reports but in about a year, the problem remains the same. Nothing has improved, I never hear back from you. Two different PCs, two different OSs, constant reports, no improvement. Why do I never hear from you? Why does this problem continue endlessly? I'm wasting my time sending you the reports. You take no notice. If you do, why does the problem continue and why do I never hear from you?
creator: pcroft810

title: download and save app on deskto
content: I want to download and save the firefox app on the desktop of my new computer
creator: 2egc.universal

title: Gestionar excepciones de eliminado de cookies
content:
estoy usando Firefox ESR en un Macbook de mediados de 2010.

en Ajustes, activo la casilla de "Eliminar cookies y datos del sitio cuando cierre Firefox" y voy a "Gestionar excepciones..."

introduzco las direcciones de sitios web con el estado "permitir".

pues al cerrar la aplicación se borra la configuración. no debería permanecer?

gracias.
creator: adarve.pob

title: Removing favorites side bar
content: Somehow I recently added a favorites side bar to my page and not sure how to get rid of it now. Now when I open my saved pages it turns it into a 2 step process. Now it opens up a side bar and then I have to click on the star to open my saved pages. Before I just clicked on the folder and it opened them up. I have searched on help but none of it helped. One solution was to got to settings and to hide side bar but I don't have that option. Tried to customized toolbars, nothing seems to work. I use the favorites all the time and to turn it into a 2 step process is a pain.
creator: rfc716

title: Video on CNN gets off its place and cannot be seen in a particular page
content: If you go to this page on CNN, the video gets off its intended place and cannot be seen unless you move out. https://www.cnn.com/2025/04/03/economy/reciprocal-tariff-math/index.html?iid=cnn_buildContentRecirc_end_recirc
creator: kp4te
